results.name: Triangle formed by reading Pascal's triangle (A007318) mod 6.
link: Ivan Korec, Definability of Pascal's Triangles Modulo 4 and 6 and Some Other Binary Operations from Their Associated Equivalence Relations, Acta Univ. M. Belii Ser. Math. 4 (1996), pp. 53-66.
mathematica: Mod[ Flatten[ Table[ Binomial[n, k], {n, 0, 13}, {k, 0, n}]], 6]
Graphics[Table[{%[Mod[Binomial[n, k], 6]/5], RegularPolygon[{4√3 (k - n/2), -6 n}, {4,π/6}, 6]}, {n, 0, 105}, {k, 0, n}]] /* Mma code for illustration, _Bill Gosper_, Aug 05 2017
